We used the Glove 840B 300D 1 ( d e = 300 ) for the pre-trained word embedding without any finetuning .
This is to train the more universally usable sentence encoder .

Layer normalization.from sentence: Layer normalization was applied to all linear projections of masked multihead attention , fusion gate , and multi-dimensional attention .

Adam optimizer.from sentence: Batch size was 64 , and the model was trained with Adam optimizer , with a learning rate of 0.001 .

residual dropout.from sentence: We applied residual dropout as used in , with dropout to the output of masked multi-head attention and SF +H F +b F of fusion gate .
